snippet: "Looking for a Missing Employee," about the troubling disappearance of a Lebanese government official, is the long overdue and too brief American debut of the actor and director Rabih Mroue.
abstract: "Looking for a Missing Employee," about the troubling disappearance of a Lebanese government official, is the long overdue and too brief American debut of the actor and director Rabih Mroue.

headline.main: Rabih Mroué at Coil Festival: Making Sense of a Mysterious Disappearance in Lebanon
headline.print_headline: Theater Review: Making Sense of a Puzzling Disappearance
